title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Foreign Banking Corporations, Supervisory Procedure 102 - Application by a Foreign Banking Corporation for a License to Establish or Maintain a Representative Office
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Foreign Banking Corporations, Supervisory Procedure 102 - Application by a Foreign Banking Corporation for a License to Establish or Maintain a Representative Office

State Regulations
§ 102.1 - General information, version 2
§ 102.2 - Prior consultation, version 2
§ 102.3 - Information and documents requested, version 2
§ 102.4 - Prior notice for regional administrative offices, version 2
§ 102.5 - Foreign banking corporations with branch or agency
§ 102.6 - Notice for establishment of an office performing limited administrative functions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Foreign Banking Corporations, Supervisory Procedure 102

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 12, 221-c

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
